name: SXZ Leon S. Kennedy - Eduard Badaluta [ Resident Evil ]
description:
All the content I make is and will be completely free on CivitAI.
But if you want to support me with a coin, then you can do it here.

Trained on AbyssOrangeMix2 with clip skip 2.

Recommended embeddings:
1. easynegative
2. bad-hands-5

Strength 0.6-0.8 is optimal.

PLEASE CHECK YOUR LORA NAME AFTER DOWNLOAD.

You may use re2leon for RE2 Remake look (shorter and darker hair, younger) or re4leon for more mature look from RE4 Remake (longer hair and brighter hair, mature, more serious and heavier look).

Also you may add police uniform, bulletproof vest in positive prompt for authentic RE2 look.
And you may use leather coat with fur trim, long sleeves, black pants for iconic RE4 look.

Negative prompt: loli, kid, child, old, long hair

Please share your feedback.

meta.prompt: dark scene, 1boy, portrait of re2leon, police uniform, bulletproof vest, (blood on face), scared, rim light, athletic, volumetric lighting, best quality, masterpiece, intricate details, tonemapping, sharp focus, hyper detailed, trending on Artstation, looking at viewer, realistic <lora:sxz-leon:0.6>
